package.name: compat-openssl097g
package.summary: compat-openssl097g: Fix for a buffer overflow and a DoS-condition.
package.description: A buffer overflow condition within the SSL_get_shared_ciphers() function and a DoS condition known as "parasitic public keys" have been fixed. The later problem allowed attackers to trick the OpenSSL engine to spend an extraordinary amount of time to process public keys. The following CAN numbers have been assigned: CVE-2006-2937, CVE-2006-2940, CVE-2006-3738, CVE-2006-4339 and CVE-2006-4343.
